li.a: ORS 3% Healthcare Deduction Refund FAQ document

article.h1: Melvindale-Northern Allen Park Public Schools COVID-19 Updates
article.h3: All Melvindale-Northern Allen Public Schools will be closed for students effective immediately, March 13, 2020. This is a result of Governor Whitmer’s order to close all K-12 school buildings, public, private, and boarding for the remainder of the school year.
article.strong: The next meal distribution will be Wednesday, April 15th.

div.strong: Please login using student account info.
